TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Mkzihing, title = Mkzihing, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mkzihing} }

S.FORM: Mkzihing Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsinchu ko /Mkzihing a niyaro', 51 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 147 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 76% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 111 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 24% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 36 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 71%, Paiwan 2%, Bunun 1%, Truku 1%, roma 1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.

Mkzihing Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsincho ko /Mkzihing a niyaro', 51 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 147 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 76% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 111 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 24% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 36 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 71%, Paiwan 2%, Bonon 1%, Troko 1%, roma 1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.
